net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.filter
Class RegexTextFilter

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.filter.AbstractTextFilter
      net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.filter.RegexTextFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
TextFilter
Direct Known Subclasses:
RegexParamTextFilter
public class RegexTextFilter
extends AbstractTextFilter

Text filter that uses a regular expression pattern and replacement pattern.

This filter uses the configuration values regex.pattern and regex.replacement to perform the regular expression filtering.

Uses the standard Java regular expression notation for patterns and replacement values. Also supports the standard group matcher variables ($1 to $9) in the replacement string.

Version:
1.9 (2008/03/30 12:43:18)
Maintainer:
Bruno Essmann <essmann@sourceforge.net>
Since:
1.6.0
